tweet: Life has NO meaning! (other than that which you give it!). You choose what any experience means in your life - choose positive meanings!
Follow your excitement to its fullest and you are being true to your highest self which knows the best path for you to take.
We all come from the One and always will return to it. Don't believe in separation, this is a trick to make you feel lonely and unloved.
Whether you think you can or think you cannot, you are right!
The cause of all negative emotions is a disruption in the body's energy system! Gently realign these disruptions with EFT and hey presto!
